data.title: Laiskotellen
authors: Contributors to Eurovision Song Contest Wiki
data.meta_description: "Laiskotellen" (English: Lazing) was the Finnish entry in the Eurovision Song Contest 1964 in Copenhagen, performed by Lasse Mårtenson. It finished in 7th place with 6 points, just two points behind the entry by Udo Jürgens of Austria.
data.text:
It’s Sunday again

The overalls are in the corner

There’s no hurry at all

The alarm clock is silent

It’s Sunday morning

And although a day only lasts a day

There’s a lot you can do

A satisfied song plays

Time to travel your own roads

Lighter

Longer

Wherever

Time to think about many things

Unbelievable

Unknown

However

To sing without being ordered

It’s Sunday again

And although it’ll soon be Monday

There’s no need to hurry

People who are lazing are singing

Time to stand here and there

Questioning

Holding

The wall is in its place*

Time to learn life’s rhythm

Life’s style

Life’s song

To the correct rhythm

There’s a lot you can do

A satisfied song plays

People who are lazing are singing

Hey, laari-laari-laa! Hey, laari-laari-laa!

People who are lazing are singing
